unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The film festival circuit is buzzing, folks! From Cannes to Kolkata, cinephiles are getting their fill of celluloid magic.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The film festival circuit is buzzing, folks! From Cannes to Kolkata, cinephiles are getting their fill of celluloid magic.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for another blockbuster edition later this year. Expect a dazzling array of Indian indie films and international premieres.
normalised: Word on the street is that the J I O M A M I Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for another blockbuster edition later this year. Expect a dazzling array of Indian indie films and international premieres.

unnormalised: And down south, buzz is building around potential Onam releases – are we going to see any sneak peeks at these festivals? Maybe a trailer or two? Fingers crossed!
normalised: And down south, buzz is building around potential Onam releases – are we going to see any sneak peeks at these festivals? Maybe a trailer or two? Fingers crossed!

unnormalised: Speaking of food, festival hopping can work up an appetite. Imagine tucking into a plate of delicious Hyderabadi biryani after a thought-provoking documentary. Heaven!
normalised: Speaking of food, festival hopping can work up an appetite. Imagine tucking into a plate of delicious Hyderabadi biryani after a thought-provoking documentary. Heaven!

unnormalised: But it's not all glamour and red carpets. Many festivals are focusing on important social issues and providing platforms for emerging filmmakers from places like Bihar and Rajasthan.
normalised: But it's not all glamour and red carpets. Many festivals are focusing on important social issues and providing platforms for emerging filmmakers from places like Bihar and Rajasthan.

unnormalised: These events are vital for the Indian film industry, offering networking opportunities and a chance to showcase homegrown talent to a global audience.
normalised: These events are vital for the Indian film industry, offering networking opportunities and a chance to showcase homegrown talent to a global audience.

unnormalised: So, grab your popcorn (or your samosas!) and get ready for a season of cinematic delights. Whether it's a local film club screening or a big international affair, there's something for everyone.
normalised: So, grab your popcorn (or your samosas!) and get ready for a season of cinematic delights. Whether it's a local film club screening or a big international affair, there's something for everyone.

unnormalised: The next few months are sure to be exciting!
normalised: The next few months are sure to be exciting!
